protocol.description: Standardized mechanism for transferring project context and artifacts between NETECMT agents.

action.step: CRITICAL: Identify target agent (e.g., Darllyson/Dev or Victor/UI).

Locate mandatory inputs based on phase: - PRD: {project-root}/{methodology-root}/prd.md - Architecture: {project-root}/{methodology-root}/architecture.md - Story Detail: {project-root}/{methodology-root}/epics/story-X.md
Generate `story-pack.json` in {output_folder}/handoffs/ containining pointers to these files.
Create `handoff-notes.md` summarising "What I did", "What you need to do", and "Known Risks".
Notify user and target agent with precise instructions on how to load the pack.
Verify all stories are in 'complete' or 'verified' status in `sprint-status.yaml`.
